events.description: A significant decline in technology shares dragging major indexes lower during Tuesday's regular trading session.
Advanced Micro Devices issued a weaker-than-expected forecast for the first quarter.
Scheduled earnings report for Alphabet on Wednesday.

facts.fact_text: During regular trading on Tuesday, the Dow fell 0.34%, the S&P 500 lost 0.84%, and the Nasdaq Composite dropped 1.43%.

evidences.evidence_text: During regular trading on Tuesday, the Dow fell 0.34%, the S&P 500 lost 0.84%, and the Nasdaq Composite dropped 1.43%

facts.fact_text: Advanced Micro Devices shares fell over 8% in extended trading following its Q1 forecast.

evidences.evidence_text: Advanced Micro Devices sank more than 8% after issuing a weaker-than-expected Q1 forecast

facts.fact_text: Chipotle's traffic decreased for the fourth consecutive quarter.

evidences.evidence_text: Chipotle slid about 6% as traffic fell for a fourth straight quarter

claims.claim_text: Investors moved capital from high-valuation tech stocks into cyclical sectors.

evidences.evidence_text: investors rotated out of richly valued technology stocks into more cyclical names

claims.claim_text: The market decline was primarily focused on AI and semiconductor companies.

evidences.evidence_text: The selloff was concentrated in AI and semiconductor shares

evidence.evidence_text: US stock futures steadied on Wednesday after technology shares dragged major indexes lower in the previous session
Advanced Micro Devices sank more than 8% after issuing a weaker-than-expected Q1 forecast
Chipotle slid about 6% as traffic fell for a fourth straight quarter
